recipe.title: Tunnock's Rocky Road Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 10 ½ oz ; digestive biscuit, 1 pack ; (300 g)

steps.step: Slice six teacakes into eighths and set aside.
Crush digestives in ziplock bag and set aside.
Melt the butter, chocolate and golden syrup in a bowl placed over a pan of simmering water.
Pour digestives and teacakes into the melted chocolate mix and stir together.
Pour into a lined tray and refrigerate for 2 hours.

Crush digestives in ziplock bag and set aside.

Pour digestives and teacakes into the melted chocolate mix and stir together.
